resources.string: Don’t have an account? Sign Up

Fit Body is a health and fitness app that helps users reach weight loss and other health goals. They provide food-tracking tools and curated meal and exercise plans that can be customized to fit your lifestyle. The central focus of Fit Body program is the logging
Consistency\n Is the Key To progress.\n Don\'t Give Up!
By continuing, you agree to\nTerms of Use and Privacy Policy.
Already have an account? Log in

Effective Date: 2025 
1. Introduction** Welcome to FitBody! Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our application.
2. Information We Collect** We may collect the following types of information: - **Personal Information:** Name, email address, and other account-related details when you register. - **Fitness Data:** Workout routines, progress tracking, and related fitness information. - **Device Information:** IP address, device type, operating system, and app usage data. - **Media Files:** Images or videos uploaded by users related to their fitness journey. 
3. How We Use Your Information** We use your data to: - Provide, maintain, and improve the MyFitness app. - Personalize your fitness experience. - Sync and store workout data with Firebase. - Enhance security and prevent unauthorized access. - Communicate updates, offers, or support-related information. 
4. Sharing of Information** We do not sell your personal data. However, we may share information with: - **Service Providers:** Third-party tools (e.g., Firebase) to help improve app functionality. - **Legal Authorities:** If required by law or to protect our rights and users' safety. 
5. Data Security** We implement security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, alteration, or loss. However, no online platform is completely secure, so we advise users to take necessary precautions. 
6. User Rights** You have the right to: - Access and update your personal information. - Request deletion of your account and data. - Opt-out of certain data collection and marketing communications. 
7. Third-Party Links** Our app may contain links to third-party websites or services. We are not responsible for their privacy practices, and we encourage you to review their policies. 
8. Changes to This Policy** We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify users of any significant changes through the app or other communication channels. **9. Contact Us** If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at [fitbody.support@gmail.com]. By using MyFitness, you agree to this Privacy Policy.

# Help & Support Welcome to the Help & Support section of **MyFitness App**! Here, you\'ll find answers to common questions and guidance on how to use the app effectively. --- ## **1️⃣ Getting Started** ### How to Create an Account - Open the app and tap **Sign Up**. - Enter your email, create a password, and fill in basic profile details. - Tap **Create Account** and verify your email if required. ### Logging In & Resetting Password - Open the app and tap **Log In**. - Enter your registered email and password. - Forgot your password? Tap **Forgot Password** and follow the reset instructions. ### Navigating the App - **Home**: View your workouts and progress. - **Workouts**: Add, edit, or delete exercises. - **Profile**: Manage your account settings and preferences. --- ## **2️⃣ Using the App** ### Adding Workouts 1. Go to the **Workouts** section. 2. Tap **Add Workout** and enter details (name, sets, reps, etc.). 3. Tap **Save** to store your workout. ### Tracking Progress - Open the **Progress Tracker**. - View your weekly/monthly workout statistics. - Check detailed analytics on your fitness journey. ### Editing & Deleting Workouts - Find the workout in the **Workouts** section. - Tap **Edit** to update details. - Tap **Delete** to remove a workout. ### Switching Between Light & Dark Mode - Go to **Settings > Display Mode**. - Choose between **Light Mode** or **Dark Mode**. --- ## **3️⃣ Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)** ### How do I customize my workout plan? - Go to **Workouts** > **Create New Plan**. - Add exercises and customize sets/reps based on your goals. ### Why is my workout data not saving? - Ensure you have a stable internet connection. - Try restarting the app and logging in again. - If the issue persists, contact support. ### Can I sync my progress with another device? - Yes! Just log in with the same account on another device. - Make sure **Sync Data** is enabled in **Settings**. ### How do I report a bug or issue? - Tap **Help & Support** > **Report a Problem**. - Describe the issue and attach screenshots if possible. - Our team will review and fix it as soon as possible. --- ## **4️⃣ Troubleshooting & Common Issues** ### App Not Loading Properly? ✅ Try clearing cache and restarting the app. ✅ Check your internet connection. ✅ Update the app to the latest version. ### Workout History Not Showing? ✅ Ensure you are logged into the correct account. ✅ Check if you have granted the necessary permissions. ✅ Try refreshing the app or reinstalling it. ### Dark Mode Not Working? ✅ Go to **Settings > Display Mode**. ✅ Ensure your system settings allow dark mode. ✅ Restart the app after changing the mode. --- ## **5️⃣ Contact & Support** 📧 **Support Email:** [support@myfitnessapp.com](mailto:support@myfitnessapp.com) 🌐 **Website:** [www.myfitnessapp.com/help](https://www.myfitnessapp.com/help) 📲 **Follow Us:** [Instagram | Twitter | Facebook] (Add your social media links) --- ## **6️⃣ Privacy & Security** 🔐 **How We Protect Your Data** - We use end-to-end encryption to secure your information. - No personal data is shared with third parties. ✅ **Managing Your Account Privacy** - Go to **Settings > Privacy** to adjust your preferences. - You can choose what data is stored and shared. 🔄 **How to Delete Your Account** - Go to **Settings > Account**. - Tap **Delete Account** and confirm your choice. - Your data will be permanently removed within 30 days. --- **Still need help?** Contact us at [support@myfitnessapp.com](mailto:support@myfitnessapp.com) and we’ll be happy to assist you! 😊
Do you want to delete your account?
